name: attac_ protec_
description:
In a world where a mankind finds itself stuck in the middle of a post-apocalyptic nightmare, a spaceship is forced to use the reanimating corpses of its fallen enemies as shields to defend itself from the clouds of nano machines...

Can the HMS attac_ survive this existential nightmare?

nah im just joking its just an interesting twin stick shooter with an interesting gimmick

WASD to move around.

Use the mouse to control the cannon.

Shoot the ON button to start.

The rest is self explanatory, really.

Finding out the gimmick is part of the fun, and definitely not a fault of the developer not conveying crucial information beforehand!
